00037               :BaseClass(param),

00134 template <class ViewBase>
00135 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::UpdateFitTransform()
00136 {
00137        if (m_framePtr->m_isZoomToFit){
00138               m_framePtr->m_isZoomToFit = false;
00139               switch (m_framePtr->m_fitMode){
00140               case Frame::FM_RESET:
00141                      SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_RESET);
00142                      break;
00143 
00144               case Frame::FM_BOTH:
00145                      SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_FIT);
00146                      break;
00147 
00148               case Frame::FM_HORIZONTAL:
00149                      SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_FIT_H);
00150                      break;
00151 
00152               case Frame::FM_VERTICAL:
00153                      SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_FIT_V);
00154                      break;
00155 
00156               case Frame::FM_UNPROP:
00157                      SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_FIT_UNPROP);
00158                      break;
00159 
00160               case Frame::FM_COVER:
00161                      SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_FIT_COVER);
00162                      break;
00163               }
00164               m_framePtr->m_isZoomToFit = true;
00165        }
00166 
00167        CalcBoundingBox();
00168 
00169        i2d::CRect boundingBox = GetBoundingBox();
00170        if (boundingBox != GetBoundingBox()){
00171               OnBoundingBoxChanged();
00172        }
00173 }

00176 template <class ViewBase>
00177 bool TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::OnMouseMove(istd::CIndex2d position)
00178 {
00179        bool retVal = BaseClass::OnMouseMove(position);
00180 
00181        Frame::CursorInfo info;
00182 
00183        // pixel position
00184        const iview::CScreenTransform& transform = GetTransform();
00185        info.pixelPos = transform.GetClientPosition(position);
00186 
00187        // color info
00188        int backgroundLayerIndex = GetBackgroundLayerIndex();
00189        if (backgroundLayerIndex >= 0){
00190               const iview::CSingleLayer* layerPtr = dynamic_cast<const iview::CSingleLayer*>(&GetLayer(backgroundLayerIndex));
00191               if (layerPtr != NULL){
00192                      const iview::CImageShape* backgroundShapePtr = dynamic_cast<const iview::CImageShape*>(layerPtr->GetShapePtr());
00193                      if (m_framePtr->IsPixelValueVisible() && backgroundShapePtr != NULL){
00194                             const iimg::IBitmap* bitmapPtr = dynamic_cast<const iimg::IBitmap*>(backgroundShapePtr->GetModelPtr());
00195                             if (bitmapPtr != NULL){
00196                                    istd::CIndex2d bitmapPos = info.pixelPos.ToIndex2d();
00197                                    ibase::CSize bitmapSize = bitmapPtr->GetImageSize();
00198                                    if (                 (bitmapPos.GetX() >= 0) &&
00199                                                                (bitmapPos.GetY() >= 0) &&
00200                                                                (bitmapPos.GetX() < bitmapSize.GetX()) &&
00201                                                                (bitmapPos.GetY() < bitmapSize.GetY())){
00202                                           int pixelMode = bitmapPtr->GetPixelFormat();
00203 
00204                                           I_BYTE* linePtr = (I_BYTE*)bitmapPtr->GetLinePtr(bitmapPos.GetY());
00205 
00206                                           int x = bitmapPos.GetX();
00207                                           
00208                                           switch (pixelMode){
00209                                                  case iimg::IBitmap::PF_GRAY:
00210                                                  {
00211                                                         info.pixelBrightness = linePtr[x] * 100 / 255;
00212                                                         break;
00213                                                  }
00214 
00215                                                  case iimg::IBitmap::PF_RGB:
00216                                                  {
00217                                                         info.red = linePtr[x] * 100 / 255;
00218                                                         info.green = linePtr[x + 1] * 100 / 255;
00219                                                         info.blue = linePtr[x + 2] * 100 / 255;
00220                                                         break;
00221                                                  }
00222 
00223                                                  case iimg::IBitmap::PF_RGBA:
00224                                                  {
00225                                                         info.red = linePtr[x] * 100 / 255;
00226                                                         info.green = linePtr[x + 1] * 100 / 255;
00227                                                         info.blue = linePtr[x + 2] * 100 / 255;
00228                                                         info.alpha = linePtr[x + 3] * 100 / 255;
00229                                                         break;
00230                                                  }
00231                                           }
00232                                    }
00233                             }
00234                      }
00235               }
00236        }
00237 
00238        i2d::CVector2d logPosition;
00239        if (m_framePtr->IsMmPositionVisible()){
00240               const iview::CScreenTransform& logToScreenTransform = GetLogToScreenTransform();
00241 
00242               const iview::ICalibration& calibration = GetCalibration();
00243               const iview::IIsomorphicCalibration* isomorphCalibPtr = dynamic_cast<const iview::IIsomorphicCalibration*>(&calibration);
00244               if (isomorphCalibPtr != NULL){
00245                      isomorphCalibPtr->GetApplyToLog(info.pixelPos, info.logicalPos);
00246               }
00247               else{
00248                      info.logicalPos = logToScreenTransform.GetClientPosition(position);
00249               }
00250        }
00251 
00252        m_framePtr->UpdateCursorInfo(info);
00253 
00254        return retVal;
00255 }

00258 template <class ViewBase>
00259 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::SetEditMode(int mode)
00260 {
00261        if (mode != GetEditMode()){
00262               BaseClass::SetEditMode(mode);
00263               
00264               m_framePtr->UpdateEditModeButtons();
00265        }
00266 }

00269 template <class ViewBase>
00270 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::SetFitArea(const i2d::CRectangle& area)
00271 {
00272        i2d::CRectangle prevFitArea = GetFitArea();
00273 
00274        BaseClass::SetFitArea(area);
00275 
00276        if ((prevFitArea != area) && m_framePtr->IsZoomToFit()){
00277               UpdateFitTransform();
00278        }
00279 }

00295 template <class ViewBase>
00296 bool TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::OnMouseButton(
00297                      const IShapeView& view,
00298                      const istd::CIndex2d& position,
00299                      Qt::MouseButton buttonType,
00300                      bool state,
00301                      const IInteractiveShape* shapePtr)
00302 {
00303        if (!state){
00304               m_framePtr->UpdateButtonsState();
00305        }
00306 
00307        return m_framePtr->OnMouseButton(view, position, buttonType, state, shapePtr);
00308 }

00313 template <class ViewBase>
00314 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::SetBackgroundBufferValid(bool state)
00315 {
00316        BaseClass::SetBackgroundBufferValid(state);
00317        if (!state){
00318               int backgroundLayerIndex = GetBackgroundLayerIndex();
00319               if (backgroundLayerIndex >= 0){
00320                      const iview::CSingleLayer* layerPtr = dynamic_cast<const iview::CSingleLayer*>(&GetLayer(backgroundLayerIndex));
00321                      if (layerPtr != NULL){
00322                             const iview::CImageShape* backgroundPtr = dynamic_cast<const iview::CImageShape*>(layerPtr->GetShapePtr());
00323                             bool isBkActive = (backgroundPtr != NULL) && !backgroundPtr->GetBoundingBox().IsEmpty();
00324                             if ((m_framePtr != NULL) && (isBkActive != m_framePtr->m_isBkActive)){
00325                                    m_framePtr->m_isBkActive = isBkActive;
00326                                    if (m_framePtr->m_isZoomToFit){
00327                                           if (isBkActive){
00328                                                  UpdateFitTransform();
00329                                           }
00330                                           else{
00331                                                  SetZoom(iview::CViewBase::ZM_RESET);
00332                                           }
00333                                    }
00334                                    m_framePtr->UpdateButtonsState();
00335                             }
00336                      }
00337               }
00338        }
00339 }

00342 template <class ViewBase>
00343 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::OnBoundingBoxChanged()
00344 {
00345        if (m_framePtr != NULL){
00346               m_framePtr->OnBoundingBoxChanged();
00347        }
00348 }

00351 template <class ViewBase>
00352 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::OnResize()
00353 {
00354        BaseClass::OnResize();
00355 
00356        UpdateFitTransform();
00357        if (m_framePtr != NULL){
00358               m_framePtr->UpdateComponentsPosition();
00359        }
00360 }

00362 
00363 template <class ViewBase>
00364 bool TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::CanBeMoved() const
00365 {
00366        if (m_framePtr != NULL){
00367               return !m_framePtr->m_isZoomToFit && BaseClass::CanBeMoved();
00368        }
00369 
00370        return false;
00371 }

00374 // reimplemented (iview::CViewBase)
00375 
00376 template <class ViewBase>
00377 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::CalcBoundingBox() const
00378 {
00379        if (!m_blockBBoxEvent){
00380               m_blockBBoxEvent = true;
00381 
00382               const i2d::CRect& lastBox = GetBoundingBox();
00383               BaseClass::CalcBoundingBox();
00384               if (lastBox != GetBoundingBox()){
00385                      const_cast<TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>*>(this)->OnBoundingBoxChanged();
00386               }
00387 
00388               m_blockBBoxEvent = false;
00389        }
00390        else{
00391               BaseClass::CalcBoundingBox();
00392        }
00393 }

00395 
00396 // reimplemented (iview::IDisplay)
00397 
00398 template <class ViewBase>
00399 void TFramedViewBase<ViewBase>::OnAreaInvalidated(const i2d::CRect& beforeBox, const i2d::CRect& afterBox)
00400 {
00401        BaseClass::OnAreaInvalidated(beforeBox, afterBox);
00402 
00403        if (!m_blockBBoxEvent){
00404               m_blockBBoxEvent = true;
00405               i2d::CRect boundingBox = GetBoundingBox();
00406               if (boundingBox != m_lastBoundingBox){
00407                      OnBoundingBoxChanged();
00408                      m_lastBoundingBox = boundingBox;
00409               }
00410 
00411               m_blockBBoxEvent = false;
00412        }
00413 }
